rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
改进癌症免疫治疗的新目标在过去的二十年中，免疫检查点抑制剂（ICIs）彻底改变了癌症治疗，在对抗各种实体瘤方面显示出有希望的结果。本研究回顾了 ICI 的最新进展，重点关注新靶标，例如具有 Ig 和 ITIM 结构域的 T 细胞免疫受体 (TIGIT)、T 细胞免疫球蛋白和含粘蛋白结构域的蛋白 3 (TIM-3) 以及淋巴细胞激活基因 3 (LAG- 3）。这些目标旨在克服限制当前疗法有效性的耐药机制，例如抗 PD-1 和抗 CTLA-4。通过识别和开发这些新的 ICI，研究人员希望改善治疗结果并为癌症患者提供新的治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/New-targets-for-improved-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/New-targets-for-improved-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acbd4a25-bb2f-4b3b-9444-7da9f388613a Wed, 14 Aug 2024 00:13:57 -0400 New targets for improved cancer immunotherapy
早期检测是战胜卵巢癌的关键网上发表的一项数据分析发现，由疼痛、腹胀/肿胀以及开始进食后不久就感到饱胀等症状引发的“症状触发测试”，四分之一的受影响者可能会发现早期侵袭性卵巢癌在国际妇科癌症杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Early-detection-key-to-beating-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Early-detection-key-to-beating-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3ed9fbe-ccfa-45bc-8722-89c5810a7086 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 00:04:23 -0400 Early detection key to beating ovarian cancer
新型疫苗接种策略有望增强猪的免疫力并控制流感传播研究表明，使用减毒流感疫苗的新型初免/加强疫苗接种方案可有效诱导猪产生强烈的免疫反应，为未来的流感疫苗接种策略提供了一种有前途的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Novel-vaccination-strategy-shows-promise-in-boosting-immunity-and-controlling-influenza-spread-in-pigs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Novel-vaccination-strategy-shows-promise-in-boosting-immunity-and-controlling-influenza-spread-in-pigs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9862c037-99d8-4f93-b863-d5751d357ba0 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 23:59:00 -0400 Novel vaccination strategy shows promise in boosting immunity and controlling influenza spread in pigs
早产儿表现出不同的认知和行为模式每年约有 1300 万婴儿早产，早产与注意力缺陷/多动症 (ADHD) 风险增加、社会发展问题和成绩下降有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Preterm-babies-show-diverse-cognitive-and-behavioral-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Preterm-babies-show-diverse-cognitive-and-behavioral-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a66f6b9a-10f2-447a-b524-3cc2677c0852 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 23:54:12 -0400 Preterm babies show diverse cognitive and behavioral patterns
革命性的电子皮肤制造工艺使我们更接近第六种“磁感知”感觉科学家们开发了一种新颖的电化学分层工艺，可以制造出耐用、灵活、灵敏度更高的巨磁阻传感器，为先进的可穿戴皮肤技术铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/A-revolutionary-electric-skin-fabrication-process-brings-us-closer-to-a-sixth-magnet-perception-sense.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/A-revolutionary-electric-skin-fabrication-process-brings-us-closer-to-a-sixth-magnet-perception-sense.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55159883-09b1-4720-8c40-a890aa3afbe2 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 23:44:00 -0400 A revolutionary electronic skin fabrication process brings us closer to a sixth 'magnetic perception' sense
AI 模型利用面部表情以近乎完美的准确度预测患者病情恶化研究开发了一种 ConvLSTM 模型，可以根据面部表情准确预测患者病情恶化，准确率达到 99.89%，有可能改善医疗机构的早期检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/AI-model-predicts-病人-decline-with-near-perfect-accuracy-using-facial-expresss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/AI-model-predicts-病人-decline-with-near-perfect-accuracy-using-facial-expresss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ee7c887-a0a5-402e-91aa-41abd2c9c82b Tue, 13 Aug 2024 23:22:00 -0400 AI model predicts patient decline with near-perfect accuracy using facial expressions
研究揭示了有童年虐待记录的成年人被忽视的认知缺陷伦敦国王学院和纽约城市大学精神病学、心理学和神经科学研究所 (IoPPN) 的新研究表明，之前的研究严重低估了与儿童虐待（尤其是忽视）相关的认知困难。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Study-reveals-overlooked-cognitive-deficits-in-adults-with-documented-childhood-maltreatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Study-reveals-overlooked-cognitive-deficits-in-adults-with-documented-childhood-maltreatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afff3c84-80d4-483c-8eab-ff75da6eedb6 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 23:00:23 -0400 Study reveals overlooked cognitive deficits in adults with documented childhood maltreatment
C-Path 向 UT Austin 教授授予突破性抗生素耐药性研究资助关键路径研究所 (C-Path) 转化治疗加速器 (TRxA) 今天宣布，德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校分子生物科学教授 Kenneth Keiler 博士因其名为“抑制剂”的创新项目获得了研究资助作为抗感染药和抗生素的革兰氏阴性细胞包膜应激反应。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/C-Path-awards-grant-to-UT-Austin-professor-for-groundwriting-antibiotic-resistance-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/C-Path-awards-grant-to-UT-Austin-professor-for-groundwriting-antibiotic-resistance-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a15e908-4576-4e10-ac8c-66a682c3ca99 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 22:50:49 -0400 C-Path awards grant to UT Austin professor for groundbreaking antibiotic resistance research
童年睡眠模式可能影响青少年酗酒和吸食大麻良好的睡眠对于儿童的健康和发育至关重要，但儿童的睡眠模式也可能与未来的药物使用有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Childhood-sleep-patterns-may-influence-adolescent-alcohol-and-marijuana-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Childhood-sleep-patterns-may-influence-adolescent-alcohol-and-marijuana-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93432877-a221-490b-9734-2ab9150caaf4 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 22:46:26 -0400 Childhood sleep patterns may influence adolescent alcohol and marijuana use
研究发现，常规实验室测试无法识别长期新冠肺炎的可靠生物标志物研究发现，尽管感染者和非感染者之间的某些指标存在微小差异，但通过常规实验室测试，尚无可靠的临床生物标志物可用于诊断 PASC（长期新冠肺炎）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Routine-lab-tests-fail-to-identify-reliable-biomarkers-for-long-COVID-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Routine-lab-tests-fail-to-identify-reliable-biomarkers-for-long-COVID-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=828ca86c-955b-4c3a-a747-a16649d18482 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 22:44:00 -0400 Routine lab tests fail to identify reliable biomarkers for long COVID, study finds
